title: International Mobile Equipment Identity
extract: The International Mobile Equipment Identity or IMEI /aɪˈmiː/ is a number, usually unique, to identify 3GPP and iDEN mobile phones, as well as some satellite phones. ... For example, if a mobile phone is stolen, the owner can have their network provider use the IMEI number to blacklist the phone.
extract_html: The International Mobile Equipment Identity or IMEI /aɪˈmiː/ is a number, usually unique, to identify 3GPP and iDEN mobile phones, as well as some satellite phones. ... For example, if a mobile phone is stolen, the owner can have their network provider use the IMEI number to blacklist the phone.
